name: Performapal Classikuriboh
text: If this card is destroyed by its own Pendulum Effect: End the Battle Phase. You can only use each of the following effects of "Performapal Classikuriboh" once per turn. You can discard this card, then target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; its Pendulum Scale becomes 1 until the end of this turn. When you take battle damage while this card is in your GY: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack, this card is destroyed.
